author: Lyzza
title: Deadly explosions during peace rally in Turkey
text: Posts: 723 Deadly explosions during peace rally in Turkey This is terrible. This article from NPR says at least 30 dead and 125 injured are the numbers so far. What the hell is wrong with people? Location: Ohio Posts: 486 Kurds want their land back, part of Turkey, Iraq and Syria and are fighting for self-determination. Targeting civilians is not the Kurd way so it must be a radical Islamic group stirring up trouble again. Location: OZ Posts: 978 When looking at the Middle East you need to try and look at from a Middle East perspective, not a western one. They simply do not share any of the same values that the west does. Human life has no intrinsic value to the radical Islamist, the only true value humans bring is how can they be used to further the cause of Radical Islam. The west will never understand that.
